reviews.comments: Excelente el dpto!!! Fuimos con un niño pequeño y una bebe y estuvimos muy comodos! Lo mejor de todo es la ubicación, todo super cerca, a lo sumo 5 o 6 cuadras... Ademas, todos los detalles pensados, desde recibirnos con muñequitos y bombones para los niños, hasta recomendaciones para hacer turismo o donde hacer las compras darias... nos sentimos como en casa!!! Excelente!!!
Excelente atención de los anfitriones , al igual que la ubicación , limpieza y equipamiento del dpto. todo mejor de lo q se ve en las fotos !!
Recomiendo a Eduardo, muy predispuesto. Buen alojamiento!
Gran hospitalidad y disposición de los dueños del apartamento. La ubicación es excelente y resultó muy cómodo para tres personas.
reviews.response: Llovió mucho, espero que hayan disfrutado de los paraguas que les dejé! ;) Gracias por cuidar el depto.

reviews.comments: Todo de diez! Gracias! ;)
La ubicación es excelente. El departamento es muy cómodo. Eduardo es muy gentil y estuvo en contacto con nosotros permanentemente. Nos sentimos como en casa, lo recomendamos.

El dpto superaba ampliamente con las expectativas que teníamos del mismo. Realmente nos sentimos como en casa. 
La atención que recibimos por parte de Eduardo fue excelente. Siempre se mostró muy predispuesto a responder a nuestras consulta se inquietudes.
La ubicación de dpto es excelente.
Muy cómodo el departamento. Muy lindo barrio. Todo funcionó muy bien.
reviews.response: Gracias por su visita! Qué bueno que les gustó el departamento y el barrio.

reviews.comments: Muy atento Eduardo al momento de llegada y salida. El departamento es tal cual en las fotos, todo funciona perfecto, muy limpio y cómodo. La ubicación es excelente. 100% recomendado.
reviews.response: Gracias pòr tu visita, vuelvan cuando quieran.  :)

reviews.comments: Muy buen alojamiento. Los dueños muy atentos y la ubicación era muy cómoda.
Todo muy bien. Eduardo se mostró atento y nos hizo recomendaciones del barrio y BsAs en general. Recomendamos la atención y el lugar para hospedarse.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por la info de los lockers. Espero que lo hayan pasado muy bien en el barrio y en el depto.

reviews.comments: Todo Excelente, gran lugar para conocer BsAs, lo mejor es su ubicación, la pasamos increíble y siempre Eduardo muy atento!

Totalmente recomendado. Esta muy bien ubicado, la zona es divertida con buenos restaurantes y bares, cerca a 2 paradas del bus turistico y del subte. Eduardo estuvo muy atento y muy pendiente de nosotros.
reviews.response:
Gracias Nhora,celebro que hayan estado cómodos.
Visiten también Buenos Aires en Primavera u Otoño,que está buena para pasear!

reviews.comments: Su hospitalidad

La casa hermosa, la ubicación increíble! Cerquita de todo! Eduardo me atendió muy bien, tuve solamente un problema con el wifi pero no dependió de el, era problema de la compañía. Pasamos muy lindo! Espero poder volver pronto! :)
Cómo siempre! todo espectacular! ya es mi casa en Palermo Soho!
reviews.response: Gracias por tu visita Álvaro, me alegro que les guste el barrio y el departamento.

reviews.comments:
El apartamento muy lindo, tal cual lo ofrecido. Eduardo muy hospitalario. La verdad que lo recomiendo, me volvería a quedar en el.
El apto esta muy bien ubicado y cumple con todo.
Muy buena experiencia, todo como lo pactado.
reviews.response:
Gracias chicos, les informó que cambié la cama del living, ahora es doble y bien fuerte! 
Vuelvan siempre!

reviews.comments: Fuimos dos días con unos amigos y pasamos muy bien. El departamento está excelentemente ubicado, a pocas cuadras de bares, restoranes y la Plaza Serrano. Buena vida nocturna y fácil de llegar. Eduardo fue sumamente servicial, dejándonos varios mapas y dándonos recomendaciones de lugares para visitar. Sin dudas lo tendremos en cuenta si volvemos!
reviews.response: Gracias! Veo que lo pasaron bien. Vuelvan siempre y buen viaje!

reviews.comments:
Espectacular apartamento en una inmejorable ubicación.
En el centro de Palermo Soho con una gran actividad nocturna pero justo en una cuadra tranquila para poder descansar.
Cuando vuelva a Buenos Aires ya sé dónde me voy a quedar!
Espero que sea pronto.
reviews.response:
Graicas Álvaro, el edificio es bien normal, pero la ubicación es muy buena, le gusta a todos, cerca de todo el ruido, pero muy silencioso.
Gracias por tu visita!

reviews.comments: El departamento impecable en una ubicación inmejorable! Y la atención y el contacto con Eduardo excelentes, nos recibió y explicó todo a la perfección y además estuvimos en contacto por (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) para cualquier duda que nos fuera surgiendo. Un 10!
reviews.response:
Gracias!  Me alegro que les sirvió el depto, deberìa haberte esperado con un vino argentino. No hice tiempo.
Será para la próxima vez, buen viaje!

reviews.comments: El apartamento de Eduardo & Gisele es comodísimo y muy agradable, buena conexión wifi, información para moverse por la ciudad con un toque personal para descubrir el barrio, cocina, enchufes, café, ducha muy caliente, sábanas y toallas impecables..., es muy luminoso y con vistas sobre tejados y terrazas bonarenses. El barrio de Palermo Soho tiene un par de plazas, una de día con mercadito de frutas, verduras y artesanía, y otra de noche rodeada de bares, y en las calles librerías-café, teatros-café, milongas, bares, restaurantes, tiendas modernísimas... calles con esquitas emparradas para la sombra y callejones con graffitis muy chulos. Eduardo estuvo pendiente de nuestra estancia todo el fin de semana, ¡gracias!! ha sido un placer.
reviews.response:
Gracias Irene! Te debo algo ??  :)
Me alegra que te haya encantado. Esperemos verlos de vuelta en nuestra ciudad!

reviews.comments: Nuestra experiencia en casa de Gisele & Eduardo ha sido fantástica. Perfecta localización y todo lo necesario en el piso para unos días en buenos aires. Pero lo mejor es la atención y consejos de los dos para conocer mejor la ciudad.
reviews.response: Estamos haciendo una pequeña guía del barrio, con los consejos y hallazgos de nuestros huéspedes!

reviews.comments: Muy recomendable. El apartamento es muy bonito, amplio y limpio. La zona es inmejorable. Se puede disfrutar de una zona de restauración y compras preciosa, con todo a mano y cerca de los transportes a otras zonas. Eduardo nos ayudó con lo que necesitamos con instrucciones claras y amabilidad. Esperamos poder volver pronto.
reviews.response:
Gracias Eugenia. 
Pasar por Buenos Aires y no bailarse un tanguito de los de acá,(no el andaluz), es un grave pecado.
Les esperamos para otra vez!

reviews.comments: Una preciosa ciudad en un barrio precioso en una casa preciosa. .con Eduardo que nos ha brindado una fantastica ospitalidad y atencion dandonos muchas indicaciones praticas utiles.Que pedir mas? ! Nota : sobresaliente :-) Otra vez gracias!
reviews.response: Gracias! Qué bueno que les gustó el barrio y el departamento! Buenos Aires, como el tango, siempre los espera...

reviews.comments:
Excelente fin de semana, el deapartamento es ideal está muy ben equipado, aseado y es muy acogedor: Se ubica en un muy buen entorno que te permita vistar caminando muchos lugares en palermo Soho.
Tenemos muchas ganas de volver y tomar  calses de tango con Gisele y Eduardo.
Saludos
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por el pisco, aún no lo heos degustado, esperamos que vuelva mi mamá de Perú y ahi lo abriremos! Saludos y te esperamos otra vez para balar unos tangos

reviews.comments: El apartamento esta precioso! muy acogedor y muy buena ubicación.  Eduardo y Gisele super amorosos y atentos a nuestras necesidades.
reviews.response:
La gente de Uruguay es siempre tan amable y simpática!  Fueron muy buena onda con el tema del horario del check out. Gracias!
Vuelvan a visitar  Palermo Soho con tiempo, que hay unas librerías - café buenísimas y mucha variedad de tiendas de diseño.

reviews.comments: El Departamento es una maravilla, y Eduardo y Gisele fueron perfectos, hasta nos llevaron a (intentar de) bailar el tango! Si un dia volveremos a Buenos Aires, intentaremos volver a este departamento...
reviews.response:
Estuve investigando y hay 40 milongasy estudios de  tango en Turín! Una buena oportunidad de permitirse una pausa : milonguear! 
Gracias por tu opinión, nos veremos.

reviews.comments: El dpto de Eduardo es increible, tremenda ubicacion, cerca de muchos bares y restaurants pintorescos. El dpto es bien luminoso y muy alegre y Eduardo esta muy atento en que no falte nada y pases la estadia lo mejor posible.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu recomendación  ! En ese barrio es difícil pasarla mal o aburrirse !

reviews.comments:
El departamento está muy bien, es acogedor y muy luminoso. La ubicación es excelente para los amantes de Palermo Viejo. El equipamiento completo y funcional, aunque no tiene lavadora de ropa hay un Lave-Rap muy cerca. La cama es súper cómoda!
Eduardo es un excelente anfitrión. Se adaptó a nuestros horarios al corto plazo, nos obsequió con fruta fresca y atendió de inmediato a nuestros consejos para mejorar los utensilios de cocina. Gracias!

The apartment is great, cosy and full of light. Excellent location in the heart of Palermo Soho. Complete and functional equipment. There is no washing machine, but there is a laundro-mat nearby. The bed is super comfy!
Eduardo is a great host. He adapted to our schedule on short notice, gave us fresh fruit and immediately acted on our advice to improve the kitchen-ware. Thanks!
Great apartment and awesome location!!!

We were very happy with our stay at Eduardo and Gisele's apartment.  It is located in a cool part of Palermo, with many restaurants, coffee shops and boutique shopping - only a short walk from the apartment.  The apartment was very comfortable and the neighborhood is very quiet.  Eduardo kept in touch with us prior to our arrival and during our stay to answer any questions we had and he was very prompt with his responses.  He provided us with loads of information and guide maps of the area.   There were chocolates on each bed stand, and fresh flowers in a vase on the dining room table - they were a very nice touch.  Thank you, Eduardo, you were the perfect host! We look forward to rent your apartment again the next time we return to visit our son.
Muchas gracias,
Maryann J

The apartment felt like home. It had everything we needed and was incredibly clean. The location is superb - neighborhood is fun and it is also walking distance to most of the places you might like to visit. A quiet space and great for sleeping, too. Thank you!

My sister and I stayed in this Airbnb for 10 days over Christmas. It was perfect for playing tourist as it has an AMAZING location in Palermo Soho -- so close to many recommended restaurants. Eduardo and Gisele's house had many thoughtful touches like fresh flowers, local travel books, a few beers in the fridge for us, and maps/local guides. Eduardo was responsive and helpful to our questions. It was a wonderful, cozy apartment and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone else!

Eduardo was a very helpful and hospitable host. Despite our flight being delayed he waited for us and gave us some great tips on what to do and the area. Palermo Soho is a Great Place to stay at. Very lively at night and with lots of different restaurants! We stayed in the apartment with three people which was great!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por la visita!

reviews.comments:
Eduardo e Gis lemsao excelentes anfitriões. Nos recebem com atenção e generosidade. Seunapartamwnto tem tudo que seu pode precisar para estadia em Buenos Aires, incluindo dicas locais preciosas, roteiros de exposições atualizados e a melhor localização da cidade. 
Recomendadíssimo!
reviews.response:
Obrigado pela visita, tomara que nossas recomendações tenham sido úteis.
E obrigado por cuidar tão bem de nosso apartamento

reviews.comments: Eduardo was a wonderful host and the apartment is super nice and perfectly located! I can recommend it for everyone...
Excelente localização. Nas proximidades há muitos bares, lojas e restaurantes.

Eduardo y Gisele's place was the perfect quaint flat located on the steps on everything you need in Palermo.  Both Eduardo and Gisele were very easy to deal with and only provided quick responses!!  Thanks for a lovely stay in one of our favorite cities!!!

O apartamento é como apresentado e tem tudo que se possa necessitar, de som, secador, ferro de passar roupa, sombrinhas ate cartao para metro e onibus. 
È muito bem localizado e com boa segurança.
Eduardo me recebeu pessoalmente, de modo muito acolhedor e dando varias dicas de cafes,bares, restaurantes e livrarias ao redor e de como me movimentar na cidade. 
E por fim, ele e Gisele me convidaram para a "Maldita Milonga". Foi otimo!

O apartamento é excelente! Muito bem cuidado, limpo, organizado e bem localizado! Excelente opção para uma estadia agradável em Buenos Aires! Os anfritriões deram muita atenção e tiveram cuidado de ajudar no que foi necessário! Recomendado!!!
reviews.response: Gracias por tu entusiasmo por Buenos Aires! Una linda ciudad para correr!

reviews.comments: I had a lovely stay at the apartment. It is comfortable, thoughtfully prepared, and communicating with Eduardo was a pleasure. He accommodated me at short notice and was pleasant and helpful throughout. The apartment is quiet, yet ideally located close to everything Palermo has to offer. Highly recommended!

Eduardo's and Giselle's place was great.  I especially loved the location, for those of you that are not familiar with BS Palermo in particular Palermo Soho is a trendy neighborhood similar to Chicago's Wicker Park or Buck town.  Tons of cafes, shops and restaurant's in very close proximity to the apartment.  Literally a  block away.  I would definitely recommend staying there, check in was easy and all the amenities were provided.

Eduardo certainly has a gift of hospitality making sure we had all we needed and shared many maps of the city and how to get around. Their place was in a wonderful area of Palermo SoHo with great restaurants and shops. The apartment had everything you could need with markets nearby. It was a secure, clean and quiet area which made it comfortable. We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to Buenos Aires! Many thanks to Eduardo and Gisele.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!

reviews.comments:
Eduardo and Gisele have a beautiful apartment in a lovely area of Palermo.
My mother and I were really comfortable and Eduardo took the time to meet us personally, show us around the place, provide us with a subway card as well as emailing us during the stay with tips for where to see the tango in Buenos Aires. Fabulous experience!

A z
O lugar é perfeito para fazer muitas  caminhadas, sair pela noite. Quase Adoramos!!
reviews.response: Obrigado pela visita! Aguardamos vocês de novo o ano que vem!.

reviews.comments: Great place and great location. Apartment was exactly as described and seen in pictures. Located in great neighborhood with lots of shops and restaurants around. Eduardo was easy to communicate with and very helpful with all of our needs. Would definitely reccomend to others.

The apartment is great, exactly as it appears in the pictures. Eduardo is a great host, excellent communication, attentive, and very accommodating. I would definitely stay here again! Great place, great location.

The apartment is in a great location, very close to restaurants, shops and bars as well as public transport, the tourist bus line and bicycle rental. 
Eduardo was very helpful, communication was easy and he provided all the information we needed about local and city life. 
I would highly recommend this accomodation!
Great apartment, and Eduardo was extremely helpful. Excellent location too. Would highly recommend!
reviews.response:
Thank you for your visit! I hope the apartment was comfortable for you and the neighborhood too!
Eduardo

reviews.comments: Excellent location, just a couple of blocks from the heart of Palermo Soho which has a great vibe and loads of great cafes/restaurants.  Also the Buenos Aires Bus that tours the whole city stops just 3 blocks away!  Communication with Eduardo was fantastic and he was very accommodating/flexible.  Would definitely recommend this apartment and host.
reviews.response:
Hello Daniel, thanks for your suggestions. I agree!
I will keep them in mind. You will see the results next time 
Best wishes
Eduardo

reviews.comments: Eduardos Appartment kann ich jedem empfehlen. Es ist in Palermo gelegen, welches meiner Meinung nach die schönste Gegend in Buenos Aires ist. Zahlreiche Restaurants, Bars und auch Geschäfte sind zu Fuß erreichbar. Die Wohnung bietet ausreichend Platz für 3 Personen. Es gibt ein Doppelbett und in einem separaten Zimmer sogar ein Einzelbett. Ich glaube, es wäre auch möglich, auf der Couch im Wohnzimmer zu schlafen. Dies haben wir jedoch nicht in Anspruch genommen. Eduardo war sehr unkompliziert und auch auf einen kleinen Fehler meinerseits bezüglich des Check-Out-Zeitpunkes hat er freundlich und zuvorkommend reagiert. Vielen Dank für diesen schönen Aufenthalt!
reviews.response: Danke für Ihren Besuch! ESPERO QUE (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) TRANSLATE NO SE HAYA EQUIVOCADO :)

reviews.comments: This room is very good.Nice location & Good Communication!!

In one word: wonderful!

Wonderful hosts, wonderful flat, wonderful location, wonderful experience. Eduardo & Gisele's place is a gem.

Everything about our stay was lovely. Check-in was super easy and flexible (much appreciated). The flat looks just like the photos, very welcoming and like home. The location is *amazing* -- in the heart of Palermo! Even extra nice touches like transit passes and lesser-known local recommendations.

We loved our stay, hope to visit again soon and would highly recommend to others!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tus palabras !
Muchas gracias por tu visita !
Muchas gracias por tus estrellas !

reviews.comments: If you want to be in the Palermo neighborhood, this is a great place to stay. It has the basics f what you need, plus some wonderful books on Argentina. The host Eduardo is so friendly and does everything possible to make your stay the best. The AC works well ( I have heat allergy) and bed very very comfortable, and good pillows. The neighborhood is very quiet, even though nearby places are lively, and sometimes with live music, the actual building and street is very tranquil. I would definitely stay here again! And I feel I have made new friends with Eduardo and Gisela.
Great space. Great neighborhood. Great hosts.

Localização excelente. Mercado, bares, o agito da Plaza Serrano.
Muito próximo a Av Santa Fé, de onde é possível conseguir transporte publico para toda cidade.
Da pra ir caminhando para o Jardim Botânico.
Gisele e Edu são super atenciosos e podem dar diversas dicas sobre a cidade. 
Recomendo e voltarei!
reviews.response:
Obrigado Guilherme pela visita e pelo cuidado do apartamento. 
Voltem sempre, o ano que vem vamos ter novidades na decoração e no equipamento !

reviews.comments: Appartamento gradevole e funzionale situato in una zona residenziale interessante per i servizi e la gran quantità di locali. Vicino alla metropolitana che si trova in piazza Italia.
Eduardo and Gisele were excellent hosts and the apartment was well set up, very comfortable and situated in an amazing neighborhood. Highly recommended.

A perfect flat for hanging out in one of the best neighbourhoods in Buenos Aires! Comfortable and with lovely decor, it is incredibly well situated near endless bars, cafes and shops, and yet is extremely quiet. Easy walking distance to lots of interesting sights and museums, galleries etc as well. Eduardo is a wonderful host - very attentive and full of very useful suggestions. We fell in love with Buenos Aires staying here!
reviews.response: Thank you for your visit, Emily. Palermo Soho neighborhood is  very nice .I´m happy you liked it!

reviews.comments:
Great apartment! Definitely recommend staying here. 

Eduardo and Eugenia were great hosts - good communication, welcoming and very helpful. The apartment is large and spacious, and it's located in a great area of Palermo - close to bars and restaurants and about 15min walk to the Plaza Italia subte station (the underground).
reviews.response:
The next time I hope you will be more dyas with us,enjoying the area
Hasta la vista!

reviews.comments:
Eduardo and Gisele were incredible hosts. They were flexible with us on check in and check out times and they made sure we were well positioned to take advantage of all that Palermo and Buenos Aires has to offer. 

The apartment is well kept and spacious.

I highly recommend this airbnb location to anyone!

Gisele speaks Portuguese English and Spanish. Eduardo speaks English and Spanish.
We had a great stay at the apartment. We had everything we needed and the location is perfect for discovering Palermo. Flat is spacious and equipped for cooking in.
reviews.response:
Tank you guys! You were excellent guests
Muchas gracias

reviews.comments:
Eduardo was very considerate.  The apartment is cute and in a great area for shops, restaurants, safety, etc.  
There is a school nearby and it seems the children are always on recess so during the day with windows open there is that noise.  Although the listing stresses the need to be quiet to not disturb the neighbors, one neighbor on the 3rd floor played loud electric rock guitar music every afternoon. Another neighbor had a fairly noisy party Friday evening but it was over by 12 which is ok.  Then another  one (I think on the first floor) had a loud party that was  still going strong when I got up the next day.  I had resorted to sleeping pill and earplugs to be able to sleep at all.  If you are a night owl and not around during the day, these things wont matter and certainly aren't the owner's fault.  I would plan to go again if I were there for partying,which wasn't the case this visit. Another weird thing was that all the electricity for our block went out  one night for about 3 hours.  I don't know if that is a common occurrence.  I went to a bar and watched news until bedtime, and lights came on shortly after I got back.  I have a travel flashlight or I would have been stumbling around blind.  Eduardo might want to invest in some candles just in case it happens again.
reviews.response:
Thank you Barbara! Every guest is a different universe..and I try to satisfy all of them.
I hope you come back next year to see the improvements. 
Hasta la vista!

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay at Eduardo's place! Communication was very good, the place was exactly was pictured and the place was cozy and in an excellent location. Would definitely recommend!

We were two friends traveling through Buenos Aires for a couple nights en route to Chile. Eduardo and Gisele were incredibly responsive and helpful in planning our stay. There was one example in particular - they were able to help us obtain pesos at a much more favourable rate than in our home countries. The place is just as advertised and positively reviewed by many others.

Spacious and ideally located this apartment provided quiet rest and access to any Buenos Aires activity. Ricardo's attention to detail and willingness to make our stay a happy one is of the highest level.  He accommodated our late arrival seamlessly and left more than the basics so that we truly felt at home! As well Eduardo and Giselle are experts in tango so this would be an ideal place for a group interested in experiencing/learning tango. If this is your first trip to Bs As Eduardo would be the perfect host to provide all the support needed. Location is 10/10 just one block from 50 Best Restaurants in the World San Pellegrino 2016 winner Don Julio Parrilla and all other Palermo restaurants, shops and attractions.  The building is a short walk from Plaza Italia subway station that connects quickly to all other locations. Emilio, the building's encargado, was also very helpful. The neighbourhood is safe and alive at all hours of day and night. Eduardo provides already set up taxi numbers, SUBE cards and discount cards for supermarkets. The apartment is stocked with reading material, music, and travel guides. Water in shower is good and beds are very comfortable. The kitchen is stocked above average with all necessities. Buenos Aires is a mecca destination that has won the 2017 best gastronomic destination in Latinamerica and this is a great place to visit if you are not sure and would like to have support. Will definitely recommend Eduardo and Giselle! Muchas gracias! Missing it already.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu visita y por los magníficos comentarios.
Nos pone felices ver a nuestras visitas felices con el barrio y conformes con el departamento.

reviews.comments: AMAZING!

Adoramos o apartamento!  Acolhedor!Muito bem localizado em relação aos nossos interesses, amplo, decoração sóbria, bem equipado, limpo.
Nossos anfitriões, desde os primeiros contatos, foram bastante atenciosos e dedicaram especial atenção no dia da chegada para mostrar tudo e promover uma ambientação tranquila.
Recomendamos fortemente a experiência a quem interesse viver Palermo/Buenos Aires como um local.

Our stay was just as great as the first if not better because we knew the neighborhood and could really get around like locals. The area is VERY quiet and I felt safe with my two year old walking even at late at 9:30 pm. It was winter and yet the heating was very good and we were very comfortable. Eduardo was sure to leave us umbrellas which came in handy more than once. Honestly, I hope this is where I call home when visiting Buenos Aires!
reviews.response:
Thank you for your visit, the flower you left near to my cactus and and for your words!

I hope the next time you visit Buenos Aires we will receive you again! And may be you can have some tango lessons to go to the milonga with us... :).

reviews.comments: The apartment was fantastic!! JUST like the photos. Gisele met me with the keys and got me up to speed on how thugs worked. I stayed there with my two year old and the neighborhood felt safe. There's a big plaza around the corner and we had fun seeing the other families and kids playing on the play equipment. I can't wait to stay there again! A home away from home for us now.

Eduardo é um anfitrião excelente. Nos recebeu com muito carinho e atenção. Foi muito além de apenas alugar um apartamento para nós. Ele nos deu dicas preciosas sobre os restaurantes, livrarias e cafés do bairro e estava sempre disponível para qualquer dúvida. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo a restaurantes, bares e lojas e ao transporte público. Muito confortável, tem uma boa estrutura para quem quer cozinhar. Recomendo muito, inclusive para quem tem filhos. Fui com meu bebê de 11 meses e adorei a experiência.

The apartment was great and Eduardo was very nice and helpful. The location is perfect, conveniently located in the center of Palermo near so many great restaurants, cafes, bars and shops. It is also a short walk to the subway so getting around the city was easy.
Eduardo was very kind and helpful and the apartment in charming, cozy and very well located near all the attractions of Palermo. Highly recommended!
reviews.response:
Thank you for your visit! 
Fueron muy simpáticos!

reviews.comments: Eduardo was the most helpful and caring host! We would love to go back anytime.
reviews.response: Thank you Anna! You were terrific guests!

reviews.comments: Eduardo & Gisele have been great hosts. The communication was very easy and fast and they provided all information required. The apartment is located perfectly in a great neighborhoud.
We enjoyed our stay in Buenos Aires and we felt that Eduardo was attentive to our needs.  His daughter even met my children at the apartment at 5:30--much appreciation!
reviews.response:
Thank you , Janet and Kaitlin, for your visit.
Han sido muy ci'omunicativos y amabvles.
Buenos viajes!

reviews.comments: Eduardo was a fantastic host. We were between accommodation on the day of check-in, and he allowed us to drop our bags early in the morning. He also suggested places for us to hang out and eat while he readied the apartment for us. Throughout our stay he checked in and inquired as to how we were enjoying the city. He also suggested things for us to do, and made it clear that he was at our disposal. The accommodation description was totally accurate. A great little place in the heart of Palermo.

Eduardo était absent à notre arrivée mais son fils était à l'appartement pour nous accueillir et ça été sympathique ! L'appartement était tel que montré sur les photos  mais un peu plus petit qu'il paraissait. Idéal pour 2 ou 3 personnes, ou 2 adultes et 2 enfants mais pas plus selon moi.
reviews.response:
Bonjour Marie, vous avez eté tres sympathiques! Je viens d´achetter une nouelle cafetiere, je crois que la semaine prochaine j´auirais un mattelas plus "dur" pour le lit du sofá du salóon.
Quel genre d´accesoires vous auriez voulu trouver a la cuisine? Un mixer? De la vaisselle? Une machine a faire des sandwichs? Chaque conseil de mes hotes cést une contribution pour améliorer leur experience. En ce cas, les futurs hotes...

Merci!

reviews.comments: I loved this apartment, communication was excellent, the apartment had a great vibe to it and the neighbourhood was great! Highly recommend this place.
reviews.response: Gracias Anna! I hope your trip to Ushuaia was fabulous!

reviews.comments: Eduardo was traveling so his son, Sebastian, assisted me with my stay. He was welcoming and extremely helpful when I had to book an early morning taxi to EZE - given I knew little Spanish. Thanks Sebastian. Also, I really loved the neighborhood.
reviews.response: Rama, gracias por tu visita!

reviews.comments: We totally appreciate Eduardo's house. It was very clean, comfortable, well located and Eduardo helped me through the process very carefully. When i returned to Sao Paulo, i asked to stay again, but the place was already booked unfortunately. You can stay here without any question mark
reviews.response: Gracias por tu visita! If you come back to B.A., you are welcome!

reviews.comments:
My wife and I had a delightful stay in Eduardo and Gisele's lovely Palermo apartment. We were met by their daughter Eugenia, who made us feel very welcome and explained everything we needed to know about the apartment and neighborhood. We were grateful that they have a SUBE card for guests that we were able to use on the subway and buses. Eugenia showed us a bird that was nesting with two baby chicks in the planter in one of the windows, and we got to watch the chicks grow over the course of the week we were there. They were great company for us.
When we arrived there was an issue with the air conditioner, but they had it serviced for us promptly and it worked perfectly for the rest of our stay. It was very easy to communicate with Eduardo and Eugenia (through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and the phone in the apartment), and we appreciated their thorough and helpful responses to all our questions. We highly recommend this comfortable and homey apartment for anyone interested in staying in Palermo. Muchas gracias Eduardo, Gisele, and Eugenia!
Great location and the best guidance from the host to move around. Will rent again in the future.

I stayed at Eduardo's place with two friends. The three of us fit comfortably and the apartment was what we were expecting. Great location in Palermo, especially on the weekend we were close to two markets, great restaurants, lots of shopping and cafes. We were also able to walk past the zoo and the botanic gardens. Eduardo was very accommodating and helped us set up a tour using his discount code when we arrived. He has a ton of travel books, maps, and suggestions for things to do. I highly recommend staying here.
reviews.response:
Gracias chicas! 
Fue un placer tenerlas por aquí y ue les haya gustadeo el barrio y el departamento.
Vuelvan siempre!

reviews.comments: Eduardo nous a chaleureusement accueillis. Nous nous sommes vraiment sentis "comme à la maison". Nous avons apprécié l'équipement et l'aménagement. Le quartier de Palermo Soho est très sympa, branché et agréable. Nous avons rencontré des gens très accueillants, très chaleureux chez les commerçants et  dans les restaurants des alentours. Si nous devions vivre à Buenos Aires, nous aimerions habité dans ce quartier!

This was an absolutely perfect 2 bedroom apartment in one of my favorite neighborhoods in BA.  Eduardo and Gisele were more than accommodating, including letting us in 2 hours early while they were still cleaning, because it was pouring rain and we had all of our luggage.  They let us drop our stuff off and come back when the place was ready for us to check in.  The entire process was easy and smooth, and the place was great for 3 or 4 people to sleep and socialize.

This is a great little apartment right in the middle of all that is great about Palermo... but with a quiet and pleasant outlook. We never got to meet Eduardo or Gisele but we did meet their daughter who was lovely and showed us everything. If you want a great base for Bs As - this is it.

The apartment is small but with everything needed,it's based in a very nice neighborhood you can find many restaurants and shops,very easy to move.Eduardo is a good host,he came to meet us and introduce how to use the apartment and the city also.There is some small problem but he fixed very quickly,and he arranged taxi for us when leaving,we appreciate it.
reviews.response:
Gracias por tu visita Kevis. 
We changed the curtain in the bathroom so it never will fall again.
I hope you had made good bussines in the fair.

reviews.comments:
Eduardo was at the apartment when I arrived and made me feel very welcome as he showed me everything I needed to know. In later days, if I had any query, Eduardo was extremely responsive.
The apartment situated on the edge of the trendy, hip Plaza Serrano in Palermo Soho, was clean and comfortable with many good restaurants and plentiful good shopping.
And if you are a Tanguero, Eduardo and Gisele  will  guide you well as  to Milongas and classes. La Viruta is very close by.
I would be happy to stay there again the next time I am in Buenos Aires.

We were warmly greeted by Eduardo into the apartment. The apartment itself was just as advertise, very confortable, and the neighborhood was great! Eduardo gave us excellent recommendations of restaurants and sightseeing at walking distance from the apartment. I really recommend this place!
reviews.response:
Gracias Jorge!
Nos alegramos que les haya gustado el departamento y el barrio. 
Buen viaje, lso esperamos de nuevo!

reviews.comments: Eduardo was an excellent host.  He made sure that everything was in place for us to have an enjoyable time in Buenos Aires, even though he was out of town during our 3 day visit.  He was very responsive to all emails before we arrived, and his daughter was at the apartment to welcome and orient us in person.  The apartment is very nice, and the kitchen was well-equipped, so that my family and I could easily prepare meals there when not enjoying the nice restaurants in the neighborhood.  I highly recommend this place and its host, as have all others who have stayed there.
reviews.response:
Hi James,
 I was in Rio, rainy and cold! Incredible! 
I´m happy that you liked the apartment and the neighborhood and also that Eugenia my daughter did a good job receiving you.

reviews.comments: The space was great and perfectly located.  Everything was clean, and Eduardo was so helpful. I would definitely stay here again!
reviews.response: Thank you for your visit, Mark!

reviews.comments:
A smooth well-oiled experience without any hiccups or stress -- reserving the place, staying there, leaving the place. Eduardo readily followed up with me soon after the reservation, providing all the requisite details, and providing help/suggestions for other things I'd asked: babysitter services, tango show, taxi, etc.

The place was just as advertised. Great location in a safe trendy neighborhood with lots of things to walk to (the zoo, plaza italia, the metro/subte, restaurants/bars) and a park/playground for toddlers and up. 

I'm glad we stayed here.
reviews.response:
Thank you for your visit! We like to receive people with children and to prepare specially the apartment for them.
I hope your trip to Iguazu has been excellent!

reviews.comments: Realmente nos sentimos recebidas em casa. A primeira vez de minha filha em B Aires foi premiada por uma recepção carinhosa, no simpático e super bem localizado apartamento de Giselle e Eduardo. E uma deliciosa noitada na Maldita Milonga foi um inesperado bônus! Valeu,Eduardo e Gilberto, muchas gracias!

We had a great time at this lovely apartment in Palermo Soho- clean, well-appointed and perfectly located in the heart of a very cosmopolitan and sophisticated neighborhood. Eduardo was very kind and helpful and quick to respond to queries.
reviews.response:
Gracias chicos!
Thank you for your visit! 
I'm glad you liked my dear apartment.

Hasta pronto.

reviews.comments: We had a great experience! Eduardo was extremely helpful and set up a driver to pick us up from the airport. He also gave us tips on restaurants and other activities to check out. The location is perfect, right in the middle of Palermo, the most charming neighborhood in B.A.!  The apartment was just as described and everything worked. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend to anyone visiting. Thanks again Eduardo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu vista! La próxima vez vamos a bailar tango los cuatro!

reviews.comments:
Everything was perfect!
Good Place
Great Spot
Loved the neigborhood
reviews.response:
Obrigado Daniel, Gabriel e Ricardo
Que bom que aproveitaram o bairro, todo mundo gosta! 
E do apé também ;) 
Eduardo

reviews.comments: My friends and I had a great time staying at Eduardo & Gisele's place! The apartment had all we needed, was super well located and Eduardo was very friendly and extremely helpful all along. We recommend it!
reviews.response: Gracias chicas! Vuelvan cuando quieran..  :)

reviews.comments: The apartment was great!  The pictures and description matched the apartment perfectly.  Eduardo and Gisele were very nice and accommodating.  They allowed us to check in early after an overnight flight and were very helpful when we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment.  I would definitely recommend the apartment and the hosts!
reviews.response:
Gracias Sarah! Espero que sigan disfrutando de su viaje.
Hasta pronto!
